rpc.dataretrieval
Class Database

java.lang.Object
  rpc.dataretrieval.Database

public final class Database
extends java.lang.Object

Final class that provides methods to connect to a relational database and execute queries.

Field Summary
static java.util.Set<Path> categoricalPaths
          A cache that holds the set of all paths that are categorical and should never be discretized.
static java.lang.String dbname
          The name of the database.
static java.util.Map<Path,java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> discretizeCache
          A cache that holds the bin thresholds for each path that is discretized.
static int NUM_BINS
          The number of bins used for discretizing quantitative variables.

open

public static void open(java.lang.String name)
Opens a connection to a specified relational database. Uses default connection information: Assumes the username is the system username and the password is blank (i.e., trusted local connections).

Parameters:
name - the name of the database to connect to.

close

public static void close()
Close the database connection.

executeQuery

public static java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.lang.String query)
Execute a query.

Parameters:
query - the query string.
Returns:
a ResultSet that holds the rows corresponding to the result of the given query.

clearDB

public static void clearDB()
Clear the contents of the current database. This will drop the database (if it exists) and re-create it.

resetCache

public static void resetCache()
Resets the caches holding discretization and categorical information.
